content.rendered:
Mannheimer Swartling’s New York lawyers have many years of experience of the complex US legal system and business landscape. The firm helps both Nordic clients operating in the US, and US clients with business interests in the Nordics.

Mandates include initial establishment issues, M&A, securities transactions and project management in US litigation. Like our other offices, the New York team often works together with other specialists at the firm and leading local law firms to ensure that we always deliver the most comprehensive advice to our clients.

Canada

Our New York team is well-versed in doing business in Canada and of working with Canadian advisers and is therefore frequently engaged in matters with a Canadian dimension. This unique experience and network of contacts ensures that any matter with a Canadian aspect is well looked after by the right local lawyers for the task.
